sqoop.arg: SELECT _SP_PalletLabelID,PalletID,MachineStage,PartNumber,InvState,PalletNo,CreatedDT,CompleteDT,Quantity,LabelTemplate,PrinterURL,PrintedDT,ScannedDT,IsCancelled,IsReprint,PartDescription,LabelSaveDirectory,IsPrintLandscape,NoCopies,LabelsPerInventoryPack, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_PalletLabel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionAttributeTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,AttributeTypeID,EntryOrder,Formula,IsExplicitStep, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionAttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionGroupID,AcquisitionGroup,Description,AcquisitionGroupCode,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ActionID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,ActionTypeID,ActionSubTypeID,ActionPlanID,ActionPlanCode,ActionName,Description,ActionOrder,RfPriorityID,SubmitterID,SubmittedDT,OwnerID,ActionStatusID,ClosedDT,ModifiedDT,LoginID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,DueDT,DeadlineDT,ExpiryDT,SortOrder, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Action WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionSubTypeID,ActionSubType,ActionTypeID,Description,SubActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionSubType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetCountTypeID,AssetCountType,Description, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetCountType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeID,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Attribute WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,RfVarGridStyleID,IsPITCols,IsPISNoCol,RfAttrGridStyleID,IsStepGrid,IsAttrSkipStep,ShowAttrInfoTip,UseAttrImagePicker,AttrGridContextMenu,IsPISerial,AutoGenerateSerialNo,PITSampling,MSTSampling,VAInterlace,IsExplicitHS,SampleSizeMode,OnDataCommitGoTo,IsDisableOOSWarnings,StepEditPolicy,DisableKeyboardOverride,ChainToStopped,DisplayPlan,AttrPassFailDefault,VariableSaveMode,AttrCellClick, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVDataEntryOptions WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT CauseActionID,MeasurementSetID,IsAttributes,IndividualDefectID,AttributeTypeID,Cause,Action,DT,VarChartOCID,RfIsOSID,VarMeasurementID,VariableTypeID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,ProductID,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAttributeClassID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,RfAcquisitionClassID,SPCChartComponentID,SPCRuleID,RfCauseActionStateID,TAGMSVALUE1,TAGMSTYPE1ID,CreateDT,AcknowledgeDT,CloseDT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ConcernID,ConcernStatusID,ConcernTypeID,RaisedDT,ClosedDT,SeverityID,DueDate,ConcernOwnerID,DepartmentOwnerID,CustomerID,CustomerContact,CustomerReference,AffectOnCustomer,PartTypeID,PartID,WOID,LineID,ProductionFromDT,ShiftID,QuantityAffected,QuantityUsed,InvIsolatedReasonID,Cost,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Concern,SubmitterLoginID,CustomerProduct,RfCurrencyID,MachineStageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,RfConcernApplicationTypeID,HeadNo,ProductionToDT,QuantityFound,QuantityReturned,QuantityScrapped,QuantitySorted,SupplierID,ToolID,VariableTypeID,AttributeTypeID,ClosedByLoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Concern WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,JobCommentLength,RfTorqueDirectionID,RfCycleEndTimeID,ThresholdTorque,RfMeasurementTypeID,RfFrequencyResponseID,UnitID,AuditAngle,CrnAdapterID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CRN_AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DefectCountPID,MeasurementSetPID,HeadNo,DefectCount,Ignored,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DefectCountP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT id,objectid,property,value,uvalue,lvalue,version, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.dtproperties WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT FaultStatusID,FaultStatus,Description,RfFaultStatusID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.FaultStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryAtLocationID,LocationID,InventoryPackID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,EditedInvAtLocationID,MovedByLoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryAtLocation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InvStateID,InvState,Description,RfInvStateID,InvStateCode,IsAddToProduction,IsAddToHFI,IsDefault, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InvState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineInfoID,CellsProduced, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfo_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionChainID,AcquisitionContextID,Sequence,LkACAChainID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkACAChain WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LKConcernActionID,ConcernID,ActionID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartDefID,Sequence,LkCSetCDefID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKCSetCDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentMaintProcID,DocumentID,MaintenanceProcedureID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentMaintProc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkInvPackInvPackID,InventoryPackFromID,InventoryPackToID,RfInventoryLinkTypeID,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkInvPackInvPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMachineStagePrinterID,MachineStageID,PrinterID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMachineStagePrinter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopReasonGroupID,MachineStopReasonID,LkMSRGMSRID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMSRGMSR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartDocumentID,PartID,DocumentID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartDocument WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkRootCauseActionID,RootCauseID,ActionID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkRootCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkSRGSRID,ScrapReasonGroupID,ScrapReasonID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkSRGSR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkUCTGUCTID,UnitCountTypeGroupID,UnitCountTypeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkUCTGUCT WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkWIRMSetReqID,WorkInstructionResultID,MeasurementSetRequiredID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkWIRMSetReq WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageEventTypeID,MachineStageEventType,Description,MachineStageTypeID,MachineStageEventTypeCode,IsAlarm,AlarmText, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageEventType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStopReasonID,StopReason,Description,MachineStageTypeID,IsPlanned,StopCode,RfMachineStopClassID,RfLineStopReasonTypeID,MachineStopCategoryID,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenancePartPlannedID,MaintenanceProcedureStepID,PartID,PlannedCost,IsOptional,Quantity,UnitID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartPlanned WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureResultID,MaintenanceProcedureStepID,MaintenanceWorkID,Result,ResultPassFail,Comments,DT,CheckedByLoginID,MaintenanceProcedureStep,StepOrder,SubPartID,Component,RfMaintenanceCheckTypeID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,Test,USL,LSL,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,Nom,Units,DecPlaces, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureResult WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,MaintenanceWO,AssetID,MaintenanceProcedureID,MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,MaintProcScheduleOnAssetID,RfMaintenanceWorkTypeID,AdhocWorkToDo,MaintProcScheduleOnAssetNo,MaintenanceWorkStatusID,ActualStartDT,ActualEndDT,ActualManHours,PlannedStartDT,PlannedEndDT,PlannedManHours,OwnerLoginID,ActualLabourCost,PlannedLabourCost,RfCurrencyID,PartsCost,LineDownCost,Priority,MaintenanceReasonID,IsPlannedDateLockedByUser,EBATriggerID,PeriodDueDT,RunHoursDueDT,PartsBasedDueDT,EventDueDT,ReleasedDT,ReleasedLoginID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,AbsoluteCounterThreshold, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWork WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetID,ActualAttrSampleSize,AcquisitionContextID,IsEdited,DT,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RevisionNo,PartID,JobID,ResumeStep,InventoryPackID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SerialNo,TimePacked,IMS_No, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ModulePackedDateTime WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCCounterID,OPCItemID,Description,LoValue,HiValue,Scale,Offset,Formula,UnitCountTypeID,ScrapReasonID,ModifiedDT,LoginID,IsProduction,AcceptableRateOfChange,RfDeltaValueModeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCCounter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCItemHistoryID,OPCItemID,UpdatedDT,RawValue,Value,Quality,CommittedDT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCItemHistory WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCServerID,OPCClientID,OPCServer,ProgID,IsActive,ComputerID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCServer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,OperationType,OperationTypeCode,Description,PartTypeID,Sequence,IsOptional, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OperationType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT PartTypeID,PartType,Description,PartTypeCode,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID,RfInventoryAccountingModeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ProductionStopID,StopComments,StopLoginID,OpenedStopDT,SavedStopDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedProductionStopID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStop_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RootCauseTypeID,RootCauseType,Description,RootCauseTypeCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.RootCauseType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapReasonGroupID,ScrapReasonGroup,Description, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ScrapReasonGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,ShiftTypeID,ShiftPatternID,FromDT,ToDT,Sequence, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Shift WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftTypeID,Name,Description,IsNonWorking, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartDefID,VariableTypeID,SPCRuleID,RfStudyTypeID,GroupingSize,MovingRange,SPCCalcStyleID,RfGroupingID,NGroupMarkerID,CpBasedOnID,CLBasedOnID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultControlLimitID,SPCChartDefID,RfChartComponentID,RfChart,UCL,CL,LCL,ModifiedDT,LoginID,ProductID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultControlLimit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCVarChartID,SPCRuleID,ProductID,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,VariableTypeID,RfAttributeClassID,HeadNo,RfAcquisitionClassID,TrendStartMSID,TAGMSTYPE1ID,ATTRIBUTETYPEID,TAGMSVALUE1,CreateDT,LoginID,IsMsetInsert, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCVarChart WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagDefectID,IndividualDefectID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT,X,Y, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagDefect WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagPartInstanceID,PartInstanceID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagPartInstance WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTreeNodeImgLocID,TagTreeNodeID,X,Y,Width,Height,MappedTagTreeNodeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTreeNodeImgLoc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,Downtime, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Job_Shift_Downtime WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool_Custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolChangeReasonID,ToolTypeID,ChangeReason,Description,ChangeToRfToolStatusID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolChangeReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,JobID,MachineStageID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,ToolPosition,ToolChangeReasonID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OperationID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT UnitCountID,UnitCountTypeID,PartID,Quantity,UnitID,DT,MachineStageID,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VarChartOCID,MeasurementSetID,SPCChartControlLimitID,SubgroupID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarChartOC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeGroupID,Name,Description,VariableTypeGroupCode,IsSmartGroup,SmartGroupPattern, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WOID,CustomerOrderNo,LabelsPerInventoryPack,ItemsPerInventoryPack,ItemsPerLayer,LayersPerInventoryPack,PackingCode,LabelTemplate,LabelColour,EANCode,CusStartNum,CusEndNum,CustomerPartNo,CustomerPartDescription,LabelText1,LabelText2,LabelText3,PrinterURL,BOMVariantID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WorkInstructionResultID,WorkInstructionStepID,OperationID,DT,Comments,LoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionResult WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Location.LocationID, Location.Location, Location.LocationTypeID, Location.IsRetired, Location.MaxQuantity, Location.LocationCode, Location.Description, LocationType.LocationType, LocationType.LocationTypeCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM Location FULL JOIN LocationType ON (Location.LocationID = LocationType.LocationTypeID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WO.WOID, WO.WONumber, WO.RunNo, WO.PartID, WO.QuantityOrdered, WO.RfJobStatusID, WO.DeadlineDT, WO.ActualStartDT, WO.ActualEndDT, WO.PlannedStartDT, WO.PlannedEndDT, WO.EstimatedStartDT, WO.EstimatedEndDT, WO.CustomerID, WO.IsDiscrete, WO.Reference1, WO.Reference2, WO.Reference3, WO.Reference4, WO.Reference5, WO.WORefID, WO_.CustomerOrderNo, WO_.LabelsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerInventoryPack, WO_.ItemsPerLayer, WO_.LayersPerInventoryPack, WO_.PackingCode, WO_.LabelTemplate, WO_.LabelColour, WO_.EANCode, WO_.CusStartNum, WO_.CusEndNum, WO_.CustomerPartNo, WO_.CustomerPartDescription, WO_.LabelText1, WO_.LabelText2, WO_.LabelText3, WO_.PrinterURL, WO_.BOMVariantID, WO_custom.BaseWONumber, WO_custom.Txn_date, WO_custom.Wip_Entity_ID, WO_custom.Alternate_Bom, WO_custom.WO_Status, WO_custom.IsBtoCto, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM WO FULL JOIN WO_ ON (WO.WOID = WO_.WOID) FULL JOIN WO_custom ON (WO.WOID = WO_custom.WOID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
